channel.description: Recent content in Windows on d.o.it

item.title: Uninstall "Mobile devices" / Phone Link in Windows
item.description: With the Phone Link app on your Windows linked to your iPhone or Android phone. If you don’t need it this is the easiest way for me to uninstall the app. Windows 11 Phone Link uninstall   Run the following PowerShell code with Admin rights: get-appxpackage -allusers *crossdevice* | remove-appxpackage Windows 10 Phone Link / YourPhone uninstall   Run the following PowerShell 5x (old version) code with Admin rights: Get-AppxPackage Microsoft.

item.title: Unblock all files in folder with PowerShell
item.description: Unblocks files that were downloaded from the internet with PowerShell in Windows: dir "C:\Users\$Env:UserName\Downloads" | Unblock-FileUnblock-File PowerShell API reference
